ygData.subject: RE: NPC's Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Grrr.  It is not 45 minutes between Paw and Qeynos, unless you take like 5 minutes to zone.  It s about 15 with Accelerando and a drum, about 20-25 without
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 14 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:

> knows I was quivering every minute the first time in Paw
> since I knew it was a 45 minute run back from Qeynos as

Grrr. It is not 45 minutes between Paw and Qeynos, unless you
take like 5 minutes to zone. It's about 15 with Accelerando
and a drum, about 20-25 without any speedup (haven't timed
that).

45 minutes I can probably make it from Freeport to Qeynos
without any speedup. With Accelerando, it's closer to a half
hour. Going through all of Oasis is 75 seconds with
Accelerando. BB docks to Kaladim is 65 seconds. The world is
not as big as most people think, it just feels big because
they find travel boring. This is why I still despise the
boats (though they thankfully added a second boat to the FP-BB
run). In the time it takes me to wait for and ride the boat,
I could've run through 4-6 zones.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
